description: This riverside walk takes you along the River Shannon in the village of Castleconnell, County Limerick. You can start the walk in the village and then head west to the river where you will find a bridge to take you to the other side. Here you can follow a pleasant footpath heading south west towards Doonass where there are some photogenic stepping stones to an island. To continue your waterside walking head north to pick up the O'Briensbridge Riverside Walk. This popular loop walk takes you along both the river and the Errina Canal in the attractive village. The trail will also take you to the nearby towns of Ballina and Killaloe.
display_address: Rockville, Castle Street, Castleconnell, The Metropolitan District of Limerick City, Castleconnell, County Limerick, Munster, V94 XR96, Éire / Ireland
